title: Let us upload a pictures
body: It would be easier for us if we can upload a picture or a screenshot hereon forums an on the report a bug pages instead of having to upload  on a server and adding here the link

You can!  While attachments aren't available on the boards itself, posting an image link like from imgur will auto upload to your thread!

There's also a solid [formatting guide ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/atIUBQPe-boards-users-guide)here to help!
